name: Goad Fire Insurance Plans of Manchester (1886)
description: Extraordinarily detailed fire insurance plans showing building footprints, construction materials, number of floors, height, land use, business names, and fire hazards. 22 sheets at 1:480 (1 inch to 40 feet).
notes:
22 sheets (Vol. I, 1886); 12+ sheets (1893); 4 volumes total.
IIIF via Old Maps Online / British Library.
Also on Flickr: https://www.flickr.com/photos/manchesterarchiveplus/albums/72157634263396654/
Wikimedia: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Goad_fire_insurance_maps_of_Manchester
Available georeferenced on Manchester Historical Maps: https://manchester.publicprofiler.org/beta/
